name: ESCAPE FROM VOYNA: Dead Forest
description: Dead Forest  is a Singel player hordes mode game. In the you waves of enemies to survive have to. Equip yourself with items and weapons. Survive hundreds of waves.    Story   You're trapped in purgatory and must find a way out. Fight your way through hordes of enemies and find a way.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP,VISTA,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Pentium 4 2.66 Ghz (or equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVidia card  512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP,VISTA,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Pentium 4 2.66 Ghz (or equivalent) Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVidia card  1GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card
